parameters.name: DBClusterId
parameters.description:
The ID of the AnalyticDB for MySQL Data Warehouse Edition (V3.0) cluster.

>  You can call the [DescribeDBClusters](~~129857~~) operation to query the IDs of all AnalyticDB for MySQL Data Warehouse Edition (V3.0) clusters within a region.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyyMMdd format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The display language of the suggestion. Valid values:

*   **zh** (default): simplified Chinese.
*   **en**: English.
*   **ja**: Japanese.
*   **zh-tw**: traditional Chinese.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number. Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries per page. Valid values:

*   **30** (default)
*   **50**
*   **100**

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the cluster.

> You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~143074~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyyMMdd format. The time must be in UTC.
